name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BrowsX - Browser Apps to Automate & Scrape the Web

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser Apps to Automate & Scrape the Web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BrowsX provides you over 80+ Readymade Web Scraper & Automation Apps to scrape data from & automate tasks on variety of sites including popular sites like 
Amazon, LinkedIn, Youtube, Tripadvisor etc.

Simply Search for the web scraper or automation app you need.
If its available already. go ahead and run it , Its that simple.

If your' required web scraper or automation app isn't available already, then you can request a new app with us for free.
We will try to make it at the earliest & publish on the Store.
